name: A.R.E.S. (itch)
description:
A.R.E.S. is a side-scroller combat game in which you control a robotic Samurai. Shoot, rocketjump and pierce your way through enemy walkers and soldiers.

Always stay moving and watch your fuel gauge!

A.R.E.S. was written in Java using Processing. I made this game in my first year of university. Enjoy!
